thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location and Value
thread.title_full: Location and Value - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: intinerant
title: Location and Value
text: Very good hotel, close (but not too close) to Times Square. Rooms decent size for NYC. We had a king w/sofa bed for 3 of us and were comfortable. Daughter said sofa bed was actually pretty comfortable and our king was, as well. Very clean and well maintained from lobby to halls to rooms and fitness center. All staff very professional, friendly and helpful. Subway entrance for ACE line right at the corner, 2 Starbucks very close, plenty of other restaurants nearby.
